items.content_html: ProxiScan is a lightweight JavaScript library for comparing two datasets of points in 2D or 3D coordinate space. It calculates similarity scores based on proximity within a user-defined radius.

items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
